sentences.en: All acts in violation of the Constitution and the law must be investigated.
sentences.cn: 一切违反宪法和法律的行为,必须予以追究.

sentences.en: He didn't want to be picked up this afternoon for a traffic violation in Las Vegas.
sentences.cn: 他不愿这一下午因为在拉斯维加斯违反交通规则而被扣留.

sentences.en: He roared that was a violation of the rules.
sentences.cn: 他大声说,那是违反规则的.

sentences.en: He was fined 200 dollars for violation of traffic regulation.
sentences.cn: 他因违反交通规则被罚款200美元.

sentences.en: He was in violation of his contract.
sentences.cn: 他违反了自己所签订的合同。

sentences.en: His possession of classified documents in his home was, at the very least, a violation of Navy security regulations.
sentences.cn: 他把机密文件藏在家中，至少是违反了海军安全条例。

sentences.en: Refugee workers said such action was a violation of medical ethics.
sentences.cn: 难民工作者说那种行为是对医德的亵渎。

sentences.en: She accused the press photographers of violating her privacy.
sentences.cn: 她指责新闻摄影记者侵犯了她的隐私。

sentences.en: The action is an open violation of the Vienna Convention.
sentences.cn: 该行为公然违背了《维也纳公约》。

sentences.en: The attack on civilians is a flagrant violation of the peace agreement.
sentences.cn: 袭击平民的举动公然违背了和平协定.

sentences.en: The driver was fined for a speeding violation.
sentences.cn: 这位司机因超速行车而被罚款.

sentences.en: The judge called the decision "a flagrant violation of international law"
sentences.cn: 法官称这一决定是“对国际法的公然违背”。

sentences.en: The upper limit for party violation in this strong interaction was quoted by Tanner.
sentences.cn: 潭纳给出了在这种强相互作用中宇称破坏的上限.

sentences.en: The widespread floating of exchange rates was in direct violation of the rules of the IMF.
sentences.cn: 大辐度的汇率波动是直接违反国际货币基金的规定的.

sentences.en: They blockaded the Suez Canal in violation of international agreement.
sentences.cn: 他们违反国际公约封锁了苏伊士运河.

sentences.en: This is a flagrant violation of human rights.
sentences.cn: 这是对人权的公然侵犯.

words.tran_cn: 易受侵犯的；可亵渎的；可违反的
违反；妨碍，侵害；违背；强奸

trans.tran_cn: 违反，妨碍，侵犯，违犯，违背，[体]违例，犯规，强奸，亵渎，污辱
trans.tran_en: an action that breaks a law, agreement, principle etc
